title: Man United’s Ryan Giggs hit a ball at Paul Scholes during the live TV broadcast of the PSV game (Video)
content:
An eagle-eyed TV watcher caught an interesting moment before PSV beat Manchester United in the Champions League this week

 

Before the game got underway Paul Scholes Owen Hargreaves and Michael Owen were pitchside giving their pre-match thoughts to BT Sport

 

As the ex-pros were nattering away Ryan Giggs was a little bit cheeky in the background

 

The assistant manager at Manchester United kicked a ball towards to talking-heads and his pass ended up hitting Scholes on the back of his legs

 

Watch the incident below

  The post appeared first on
